title: WTB Frank Keetz "Baseball Advertising Trade Cards, 3rd Edition"
author: Maelman

posts.post_title: WTB Frank Keetz "Baseball Advertising Trade Cards, 3rd Edition"
posts.post_content: I enjoy the artwork on these cards and would love to purchase a copy of this book that might be on one of your bookshelves collecting some dust!  Does anyone have one they would like to part with?  Until then I will be utilizing the digital version on schenectadyhistorical.org.

not sure which edition I have (old) - I think the guide by Madmoney (rip) has nice pix and he was a bit more meticulous - still available from his wife......
friendly,
henry
